stop_location: Avondale Store at 5009 King St W.
The Brockville bus stop is located within the Food Basics business area, at the parking lot next to Kentucky Fried Chicken.
Arrivals and departures are located at the bus lane on the east side of the Buffalo Niagara International Airport terminal building on the arrivals level.
Arrivals and departures are located at gate 13 in the Metropolitan Transportation Center terminal building at 181 Ellicott Street.
The stop is located at the Cambridge/Galt Bus Terminal at 35 Ainslie Street.
The Cornwall bus stop is located at the Irving 24 Service Center, off Brookdale Ave, north of Highway 401.
Giant Tiger Store at 36 Main St W.
The stop is located at the GO Center at 36 Hunter St E and James St.
The McMaster University stop is located at McMaster University at Mary Keyes and Cootes Drive.
The Kingston Bus Terminal is located at 1175 John Counter Blvd, south of the 401 between Division Street and Sir John A McDonald Blvd.
In Kirkland the bus stops at the Depanneur Beausoir at 2875 St Charles Blvd.
Kitchener Transportation Centre at 15 Charles St W.
The Montreal stop is located on the south end of Le1000 de La Gauchetière building (Métro Bonaventure). Departures & Arrivals will take place outside 997 St-Antoine Ouest.
The Niagara Falls Bus Terminal is situated at 4555 Erie Ave, Niagara Falls, ON; on the south-west corner of Bridge Street and Erie Ave.
In Scarborough the bus stops at the Scarborough Town Center located south of the 401 at McCowan Rd, at the transit area on the south side of the mall - Platform #5.
Union Bus Terminal at 70 Carlisle St.
The Toronto Bus Terminal is located in the heart of downtown Toronto at 610 Bay Street, 1 block from The Eaton Center.
In Whitby the bus stops at the Whitby GO Transit Station on Brock Street.
